summary: A simple color retexture mod to replace Vurt's Skyrim Flora Overhaul lupin flower color for less noticeable colors. Comes in 4 flavors: white, yellow, red and blue.
descriptionHtml:
If you think those lupin flowers to be very intrusive and strong, I have recolored Vurt's SFO lupin flower with a bit more "modest" colors so they don't stand out so much. So you should get the awesome mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url] from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41808/?]vurt[/url] before doing this. Make a backup of vurt's SFO lupin flower texture file located in Data/textures/landscape/grass folder (file name is [u]vurt_lupins.dds[/u])Â if you decide to revert it back to SFO default color.

They come in 4 flavours: white, yellow, red and blue. These are simple replacers, they don't have ESPs, nor scripts, it simply changes the color of the lupin flower. You can choose a color and simply replace the original file with your choice. Or download all 4 and change whenever you want to by simply overwriting the existing file. Install it manually in your Data/textures/landscape/grass folder or via NMM.

Here's some screens to help you choose:

[img]http://s16.postimg.org/xij3sqbph/enb2016_2_19_23_27_39.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s16.postimg.org/4rma2o5vp/enb2016_2_19_23_29_11.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s16.postimg.org/j0lwkqked/enb2016_2_19_23_32_44.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s16.postimg.org/rk5aihsqt/enb2016_2_19_23_34_15.jpg[/img]
author: boltstab
